com.cscguru.client.map

Class Spawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.map.Spawn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdatable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Spawn
extends org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
implements IUpdatable
    Handles Spawn map objects. Class handles the spawning and generation of mobs.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spawn(float x, float y, Sprite ss, MobStat ms, AtlasMap tmx)
      Initializes a spawner at a specific location and generates a mob.
